column5: This year I will not be getting to the border in Fort Frances until Sunday morning about 8:00. Will there be beer stores open in Ontario? What about the duty free store in International Falls? If you buy Blue, is the same as the beer I buy north of the border? Thanks, Fritz
The beer Stores are open on Sunday in Ontario.

Actually you might want to call ahead and check......I think it might depend on the municipality you are in....they also might have restricted hours for sales on Sunday. I'm sure I bought beer on Sunday last year though.
The LCBO store at third & Mowat in FT Francis is opened from 12 Noon to 4PM on sundays Larry S
[font color=green size=3][b]LCBO stores sell alchol, BEER stores sell beer, in Ontario, so be sure you go to the right one.
